snippet.title: Hobart man charged over cannabis raids
snippet.content: A Hobart man has been charged with drug trafficking after police uncovered two "sophisticated" hydroponic cannabis set ups. Officers raided a pair of Glenorchy houses owned by the 41-year-old on Wednesday, and allegedly found 72 cannabis plants and eight kilograms of the drug worth $520,000. He is due to face court on September 11. (C) AAP 2017
